name: SetOpeningArchivedState
description:
Set or unset the archived state of a job opening.

Use this tool to change the archived status of a specific job opening. Useful when needing to manage the visibility or status of job opportunities in a system, requiring 'jobsWrite' permission.

parameters.name: opening_id
parameters.description: The ID of the job opening to archive or unarchive.

value_schema.description: The id of the opening you want to archive

parameters.name: set_archived_state
parameters.description: Boolean to set the archived state of a job opening. Use true to archive and false to unarchive.

value_schema.description: The new archived state you want to update the opening to
